      • buildMetadata

        public static DecisionTreeMetadata buildMetadata(RDD<LabeledPoint> input,
                                 Strategy strategy,
                                 int numTrees,
                                 String featureSubsetStrategy)
        Construct a DecisionTreeMetadata instance for this dataset and parameters. This computes which categorical features will be ordered vs. unordered, as well as the number of splits and bins for each feature.

      • buildMetadata

        public static DecisionTreeMetadata buildMetadata(RDD<LabeledPoint> input,
                                 Strategy strategy)
        Version of buildMetadata(org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD<org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LabeledPoint>, org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.configuration.Strategy, int, java.lang.String) for DecisionTree.

      • numUnorderedBins

        public static int numUnorderedBins(int arity)
        Given the arity of a categorical feature (arity = number of categories), return the number of bins for the feature if it is to be treated as an unordered feature. There is 1 split for every partitioning of categories into 2 disjoint, non-empty sets; there are math.pow(2, arity - 1) - 1 such splits. Each split has 2 corresponding bins.

      • numSplits

        public int numSplits(int featureIndex)
        Number of splits for the given feature. For unordered features, there are 2 bins per split. For ordered features, there is 1 more bin than split.

      • setNumSplits

        public void setNumSplits(int featureIndex,
                int numSplits)
        Set number of splits for a continuous feature. For a continuous feature, number of bins is number of splits plus 1.

      • subsamplingFeatures

        public boolean subsamplingFeatures()
        Indicates if feature subsampling is being used.
